mapper.update: UPDATE FESTIVAL SET FESTIVAL_TITLE=#{festival_Title}, FESTIVAL_CONTENT=#{festival_Content}, FESTIVAL_THUMBNAIL=#{festival_Thumbnail}, FESTIVAL_STARTDATE=#{festival_StartDate}, FESTIVAL_ENDDATE=#{festival_EndDate}, FESTIVAL_PHONE=#{festival_Phone}, FESTIVAL_HOMEPAGE=#{festival_Homepage}, FESTIVAL_ADDRESS=#{festival_Address}, FESTIVAL_HOST=#{festival_Host}, FESTIVAL_SUB=#{festival_Sub}, FESTIVAL_PRICE=#{festival_Price}, FESTIVAL_TAG=#{festival_Tag}, FESTIVAL_PROCEEDING=#{festival_Proceeding} WHERE FESTIVAL_NO=#{festival_No}
mapper.select: select rownum ,f2.* from ( SELECT f.*, DECODE(festival_proceeding,'진행',1,'예정',2,'종료',3) as fp FROM FESTIVAL f order by fp asc, f.festival_count desc ) f2 where rownum <= 3
